title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2388/95 of 11 October 1995 repealing Regulations (EC) No 1179/95 and (EC) No 1180/95 relating to invitations to tender for the export of cereals held by the Austrian intervention agency
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2388/95 of 11 October  1995 repealing Regulations (EC) No 1179/95 and (EC) No 1180/95 relating to invitations to tender  for the export of cereals held by the Austrian intervention agency
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Commission Regulations (EC) No 1179/95 and (EC) No 1180/95 are hereby  repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
